events.title: George Washington's Farewell to the Continental Army
events.description: General George Washington gave his farewell address to the Continental Army at Rocky Hill, New Jersey, marking the end of his command in the Revolutionary War.
events.significance: This event symbolized the voluntary relinquishment of power, reinforcing the principles of civilian control and setting a precedent for presidential conduct.

events.title: Ford Motor Company Introduces the Moving Assembly Line
events.description: Henry Ford unveiled the first moving assembly line for the mass production of automobiles, revolutionizing manufacturing processes.
events.significance: This innovation drastically lowered production costs and made automobiles affordable to the masses, transforming transportation and industry.

events.title: Closure of the Geneva Conference
events.description: The Geneva Conference concluded, leading to agreements on the ceasefire in Indochina and the temporary division of Vietnam at the 17th parallel.
events.significance: These agreements significantly shaped the geopolitical landscape of Southeast Asia and set the stage for the Vietnam War.
